#summary Information about iReSign

= Introduction =

iReSign allows iDevice app bundles (.ipa) files to be signed or resigned with digital certificate from Apple for distribution.

This tool is aimed primarily at enterprises who distribute their own apps through an internal "App Store".

= Requirements =

* Mac OS 10.6+

* A certificate issued by Apple.

* An .ipa-file which you want to sign.

Note: Xcode is *not* required.
